name: Rabbit Meadow (itch)
description:
🐰 Rabbit Meadow is a lighthearted game where you play as a rabbit and explore around a beautiful meadow. 

🐰 Customize your rabbit's fur, shape, ears and more to create your favorite furry friend. 

🐰 Find and collect rabbit toys throughout the meadow 

🐰 Interact with other friendly animals in the meadow. Swim along the ducks, hop with the frogs, and scurry with the squirrels.
